nodes.description: 2019年7月28日，针对副总统候选人阿姆鲁拉·萨利赫的喀布尔办公室发生了一起自杀式汽车炸弹袭击，造成20多人死亡，50多人受伤，萨利赫本人也受轻伤。
nodes.support_text: On 28 July 2019, a suicide car bombing occurred in the Kabul office of the Vice Presidential candidate Amrullah Saleh, killing over 20 and injuring over 50 including slightly wounding Saleh.

nodes.description: 爆炸发生后，四名枪手冲入该大楼。
nodes.support_text: Four gunmen then stormed the building...

nodes.description: 枪手与安保部队展开对峙，围困了大楼数小时。
经过数小时的围困，四名枪手最终被击毙。

edges.support_text: Four gunmen then stormed the building...
Four gunmen then stormed the building and laid siege for hours...
...laid siege for hours before being killed.
